pages.title: Leopard
pages.text: The leopard ($(o)Panthera pardus$()) is one of the five extant species in the genus Panthera, a member of the cat family, Felidae.$(br2)It occurs in a wide range in sub-Saharan Africa, in some parts of Western and Central Asia, Southern Russia, and on the Indian subcontinent to Southeast and East Asia.

pages.title: Leopard
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:porkchop$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 5 Days
